Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are the most desirable fuel cells for stationary power generation and are used as auxiliary power sources in transportation applications.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: The fuel flexibility and higher efficiency of an SOFC make it a favorable choice.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: The Ni-based catalysts that are currently used have coking and sulfur tolerance issues.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: The current work focuses on studying the effect of H2S on the catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts, for various methane conversion reactions.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: Steady-state reaction experiments are complemented by temperature programmed desorption (TPD) studies and post-reaction characterization using TEM and X-ray absorption fine structure (XAFS) spectroscopy.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: It is found that oxidation sites are less susceptible to sulfur poisoning, and that the presence of water in the feed increases deactivation due to sulfur.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: Interactions between sulfur and the YSZ support are also observed.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts

Sentencas: These results provide further insight into the deactivation process due to sulfur over Ni-YSZ catalysts, and hold relevance in determining operating conditions of internally reforming fuel cells for sulfur-contaminated hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: Effect of H2O on sulfur poisoning and catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ catalysts
